title: Overall perspective of electrospun semiconductor metal oxides as high-performance gas sensor materials for NOx detection
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7806-7824
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08119B, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Niloufar Khomarloo, Elham Mohsenzadeh, Hayriye Gidik, Roohollah Bagherzadeh, Masoud Latifi
Gas sensors based on nanostructured semiconductor metal oxide (SMO) materials poses many advantages. This review focuses on the detection of NO and NO2 gases.
